description: Try our easy to follow Massaman Roast Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast chicken,Roast,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Massaman Roast Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g small Gold sweet potatoes, cut into thick wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Place both potatoes in a large oiled baking dish.
Rinse chicken, pat dry with paper towel and place on top of potatoes. Place 2 lime halves inside chicken and tie legs together with string. Place remaining lime into pan.

Combine 1 tbs curry paste with oil. Rub over chicken. Cover loosely with foil. Bake for 1 hour and 30 minutes, removing foil after 45 minutes, or until potatoes are tender and chicken is cooked through. Stand, loosely covered, for 10 minutes before serving.

Meanwhile, cook remaining curry paste in a medium saucepan over medium heat, stirring, for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add coconut milk and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring, for 5 minutes or until sauce thickens and reduces. Squeeze juice from half a roasted lime into pan, then add fish sauce and sugar.
Scatter coriander over chicken and serve with sauce and vegetables.
